citation_details.title: Infant EEG microstate dynamics relate to fine-grained patterns of infant attention during naturalistic play with caregivers
citation_details.author: A Bagdasarov, S Markert, MS Gaffrey
citation_details.abstract: As infants grow, they develop greater attentional control during interactions with others,  shifting from patterns of attention primarily driven by caregivers (exogenous) to those that are
citation_details.short_author: A Bagdasarov, S Markert, MS Gaffrey
